name: Orpheus' Descent
description: Orpheus' Descent is our take on a downwards scrolling dungeon with pacifist game mechanics. Join us on a journey down the depths of hell to rescue Orpheus' Wife (Do make sure you do not look back 😉 ). A classic mix of enemies like the Cerberus, hydras & the medusa coupled with clever Level Design made to challenge your grasp of reactions. Can you challenge HADES & Rescue Eurydice ? Play Orpheus' Descent to find out.
